aiAssistant.title: Arkit Assistant
aiAssistant.subtitle: How can I help you?
aiAssistant.welcome: Hello! I'm your smart assistant. I can help you choose the right tool or perform tasks for you. Try asking me: 'compress images' or 'convert image to WebP'
aiAssistant.toolDetected: Great! It looks like you need {tool}. Let me guide you to it.
aiAssistant.greeting: Hello! How can I help you today?
aiAssistant.help:
